channel.title: Public boolean nonWild help [resolved]
channel.description:
OK guys I have this on my server. I know what it does, If I'm in one of these area's, then i'm not in the wildy. But, how would I edit this so that none of Varrock is in the wildy either? I tried myself several times and I just got errors. :(. I also used the search box but I couldn't find anything that helped. Can some help me? I wanted it so that everything, except Varrock, was wildy. Anyone?
[code] public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2887 && absX <=2927 && absY >=9670 && absY <=9698 )||(absX >=2895 && absX <=2923 && absY >=9714 && absY <=9745 )||(absX >=2753 && absX <=2806 && absY >=9177 && absY <=9216 )|| (absX >=3368 && absX <=3383 && absY >=9744 && absY <=9757 )|| (absX >=3378 && absX <=3384 && absY >=9741 && absY <=9756 )|| (absX >=3368 && absX <=3367 && absY >=9744 && absY <=9751 )|| (absX >=3373 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9765 && absY <=9771 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3371 && absY >=9768 && absY <=9771 )||(absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )||(absX >=3365 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9764 )||(absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )|| (absX >=3367 && absX <=3374 && absY >=9765 && absY <=9767 )||(absX >=3365 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9764 )|| (absX >=3372 && absX <=3365 && absY >=9764 && absY <=9767 )|| (absX >=3369 && absX <=3372 && absY >=9764 && absY <=9764 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3366 && absY >=9767 && absY <=9766 )|| (absX >=3365 && absX <=3366 && absY >=9766 && absY <=9767 )|| (absX >=3437 && absX <=3430 && absY >=9772 && absY <=9777 )|| (absX >=3430 && absX <=3437 && absY >=9772 && absY <=9777 )|| (absX >=3350 && absX <=3337 && absY >=3473 && absY <=3460 )|| (absX >=3352 && absX <=3337 && absY >=3461 && absY <=3471 )|| (absX >=3352 && absX <=3342 && absY >=3461 && absY <=3473 )|| && absY <=5346 )|| (absX >=2284 && absX <=2300 && absY >=3120 && absY <=3160 )|| (absX >=1998 && absX <=2017 && absY >=4430 && absY <=4450 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return [/code]
Solum.

item.title: Public boolean nonWild help [resolved]
item.dc:creator: @Solumstone Solumstone
item.description:
@Solumstone wrote:

edited OK, I think I get it. the first absX is the southwest Xpos. The second absx is the north west xpos. So the first absy is the south west y-pos and the second absy is the northeast ypos. OK, so how would I make the entire map wild, barring Varrock.

Read full topic

item.title: Public boolean nonWild help [resolved]
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Thats the list of coords of your safe zone. The first pair of, absX’s, are the X coord of th emost south-west point, and the north-east point. The same with absY

Read full topic

item.description:

OK guys I have this on my server. I know what it does, If I’m in one of these area’s, then i’m not in the wildy. But, how would I edit this so that none of Varrock is in the wildy either? I tried myself several times and I just got errors. :(. I also used the search box but I couldn’t find anything that helped. Can some help me?
